Amazon.com : Hound Dog Products HDP1-6 Weed Hound : Hand Weeders : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: After trying several newer models and other brands after I bought my new house ( Fiskars, Weasel, new Weed Hound) I just couldn't take it. They didn't work at all. I was super excited to see Jim selling some of these older models on Amazon. It is awesome and totally worth it. Jim photocopied the directions since they were not in the original packaging. That is handy...
